address_prefixes.name: address_prefixes
address_prefixes.description: OPTIONAL - IP range that will be defined for the VPC for a certain location. Use only with manual address prefixes

classic_access.name: classic_access
classic_access.description: OPTIONAL - Classic Access to the VPC

default_network_acl_name.name: default_network_acl_name
default_network_acl_name.description: OPTIONAL - Name of the Default ACL. If null, a name will be automatically generated

default_routing_table_name.name: default_routing_table_name
default_routing_table_name.description: OPTIONAL - Name of the Default Routing Table. If null, a name will be automatically generated

default_security_group_name.name: default_security_group_name
default_security_group_name.description: OPTIONAL - Name of the Default Security Group. If null, a name will be automatically generated

network_acls.name: network_acls
network_acls.description: List of ACLs to create. Rules can be automatically created to allow inbound and outbound traffic from a VPC tier by adding the name of that tier to the `network_connections` list. Rules automatically generated by these network connections will be added at the beginning of a list, and will be web-tierlied to traffic first. At least one rule must be provided for each ACL.

network_cidr.name: network_cidr
network_cidr.description: Network CIDR for the VPC. This is used to manage network ACL rules for cluster provisioning.

prefix.name: prefix
prefix.description: The prefix that you would like to append to your resources

region.name: region
region.description: The region to which to deploy the VPC

resource_group_id.name: resource_group_id
resource_group_id.description: The resource group ID where the VPC to be created

routes.name: routes
routes.description: OPTIONAL - Allows you to specify the next hop for packets based on their destination address

security_group_rules.name: security_group_rules
security_group_rules.description: A list of security group rules to be added to the default vpc security group

subnets.name: subnets
subnets.description: List of subnets for the vpc. For each item in each array, a subnet will be created. Items can be either CIDR blocks or total ipv4 addressess. Public gateways will be enabled only in zones where a gateway has been created

tags.name: tags
tags.description: List of Tags for the resource created

use_manual_address_prefixes.name: use_manual_address_prefixes
use_manual_address_prefixes.description: OPTIONAL - Use manual address prefixes for VPC

use_public_gateways.name: use_public_gateways
use_public_gateways.description: Create a public gateway in any of the three zones with `true`.

network_acls.name: network_acls
network_acls.description: List of shortnames and IDs of network ACLs

public_gateways.name: public_gateways
public_gateways.description: Map of public gateways by zone

subnet_detail_list.name: subnet_detail_list
subnet_detail_list.description: A list of subnets containing names, CIDR blocks, and zones.

subnet_zone_list.name: subnet_zone_list
subnet_zone_list.description: A list containing subnet IDs and subnet zones
